data.name: OpenGUICommand
data.value: opengui - If closed, will open and/or focus the GUI to the front.

data.name: StartCommand
data.value: start - Starts the server if its not running!

data.name: StopCommand
data.value: stop - stops the server if it's running!

data.name: RestartCommand
data.value: restart - Restarts IRSE, if autostart is set the server will start automatically.

data.name: CheckUpdateCommand
data.value: checkupdate - Checks for IRSE updates. Prompts user with new update details.

data.name: ForceUpdateCommand
data.value: forceupdate - Forces an Update of IRSE with no prompts.
